content: Name: Zijian He School: Purdue University
summary: Name: Zijian He School: Purdue University
title: 🙋🏻‍♂️ AboutMe

content:
2022 RMUL A brand-new designed🛠️ Infantry robot for RMUL in Texas A&M University, competing with 15 universities from the US, Canada, Mexico, and Italy.
✨Ranked #4 in 3v3 competition in NA region.
For detailed technical description and download CAD files, please visit Purdue RoboMaster Wiki 🖊️CAD Design 💫Battle 📸Robot Showcase <!DOCTYPE HTML> <!DOCTYPE HTML> <!DOCTYPE HTML> 2022 ICRA This Infantry robot is an updated version from the robot for 2019 RMUC.
Relocated projectile tank to optimize the feeding path to prevent projectiles from jamming inside the feeding tubes. Upgraded the stiffness of the suspension spring so that it can run much smoothly in flat ground. 🖊️CAD Design 📸Robot Showcase 2019 RMUC 🖊️CAD Design 📸Robot Showcase
